content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 Nov 2018How to calculate annual interest for sti?I just started puchasing sti-etf using POSB invest-saver. I see people mentioning different investment vehicles with x% interest annually and I'm wondering how do I calculate this x% for my sti-etf. Thanks!1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 08 Nov 2018Interests are paid to lenders while dividends are paid to owners. In your case, the ETF pays dividends. You can calculate dividend yield by annual dividend / current unit price.0 comments0
